section.title: Standard Operations by Work Center
section.para: To view a list of Standard Operations performed at a Work Center, select the "Standard Operations by Work Center" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Standard Operations by Work Center, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify Work Center whose Standard Operations you want to display.
The Site code for the Site where the Work Center is located will display once a Work Center has been selected.
Display lists Standard Operations by Work Center, using the specified parameters.
